name: Move-Jump-Shoot
description:
Move, Jump, and Shoot your way through several microgames in only 7 seconds! However, you can only use one ability per game so choose wisely!

Instructions:

(Z) Select Move

(X) Select Jump

(C) Select Shoot

(arrow keys) Move

(space) Jump/Shoot

Credits:

PixelsRUs font castpixel
